introduction: How do you get a society that provides basic decent services to all citizens? Political theorist Joh

vocabulary.example: The protestors demanded an end to the injustice in the legal system.

vocabulary.definition: a person or thing serving as a typical example or excellent model
vocabulary.example: She was considered an exemplar of dedication and hard work in the company.
The toxic relationship had a corrosive effect on her mental health.

vocabulary.definition: so small or unimportant as to be not worth considering
vocabulary.example: The extra cost was negligible compared to the overall budget.

vocabulary.definition: involving strongly critical or controversial arguments
vocabulary.example: The author's latest book is a polemical work challenging traditional beliefs.

vocabulary.definition: not rigidly following a specific doctrine or set of beliefs
vocabulary.example: The approach taken by the organization was refreshingly undoctrinaire, allowing for diverse perspectives.
